description:
Japanese swords, spears, knives, wakizashi... the sacred land of blades, Blade Hall.
At the elegant Shinise Ryokan they are met by the landlady and good friend of their landlord. While Natsuno traveled far to sharpen the dull blade of her favorite scissors Hasajiro, she secretly had another motive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yu ni Irite Inu ni Irazare
湯に入りて犬に入らざれ
